name: ads-pipeline-extension-sample
description: azure devops 流水线插件的示例
author: Lean-Soft

scripts.package:prod:sample: npm run precompiled:sample && tfx extension create --rev-version --manifest-globs vss-extension-sample.json --output-path ./out
scripts.publish:test:sample: npm run precompiled:sample && tfx extension publish --rev-version --manifest-globs vss-extension-sample.json --output-path out --service-url https://tfs.devopshub.cn/ --token {token}
